Structs/PinState.html#/s:8Manifest8PinSt.name: branch
Structs/PinState.html#/s:8Manifest8PinSt.abstract: The branch of the depenency that is being used.

Structs/PinState.html#/s:8Manifest8PinSt.name: revision
Structs/PinState.html#/s:8Manifest8PinSt.abstract: The current git revision of the dependency that was fetched.

Structs/PinState.html#/s:8Manifest8PinSt.name: version
Structs/PinState.html#/s:8Manifest8PinSt.abstract: The current git tag of the dependency that is pulled into the project.

Structs/Pin.html#/s:8Manifest3PinV5state.name: state
Structs/Pin.html#/s:8Manifest3PinV5state.abstract: The version data of the dependecy pulled into the dependeny.

Structs/Resolved.html#/s:8Manifest8Resol.name: version
Structs/Resolved.html#/s:8Manifest8Resol.abstract: Not sure what this is for, but it exists.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:8Manifest11E.name: commandline
Structs/Environment.html#/s:8Manifest11E.abstract: Used to tell the manifest instance that it is being used in the command-line.

Structs/Environment.html#/s:8Manifest11E.name: testing
Structs/Environment.html#/s:8Manifest11E.abstract: Used to tell the manifest it is being used to test it’s methods on a string.

Structs/Environment.html.name: Environment
Structs/Environment.html.abstract: Used for telling the current manifest instance what environment it is being used in.

Structs/PinState.html.name: PinState
Structs/PinState.html.abstract: The version data for a dependeny pin.

Enums/DependencyVersionType.html#/s:8Man.name: init(from:)

Enums/DependencyVersionType.html.name: DependencyVersionType
Enums/DependencyVersionType.html.abstract: The version syntax optionas that can be used

Enums/LibraryLinkingType.html.abstract: Defines wheather a library should be linked to it’s clients.

Enums/ProviderType.html.name: ProviderType
Enums/ProviderType.html.abstract: Designates which package manager the provider is for.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: isTest
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: Wheather the target is for testing or not.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: path
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: The path to the target from the root of the project.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: publicHeadersPath
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: The path to the directory containing public headers of a C target. Only valid for C family library targets.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: dependencies
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: The targets in the package or one of the packages dependencies that the declared target can access through imports.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: exclude
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: The files and directories that are excluded from being picked up as sources.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: source
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: The source files to include in the target. If it is empty, then any valid source file is included.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: manifest
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: The Targets instance that the target originates from.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: raw
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: The raw string representation of the target’s declaration in the manifest.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: init(match:in:with:)
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: Creates a Target with a RegEx match from a String.

Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.name: save()
Classes/Target.html#/s:8Manifest6TargetC.abstract: Updates the target’s instance in the projects manifest.

Classes/Provider.html#/s:8Manifest8Provi.abstract: The package manager that the provider represents

Classes/Provider.html#/s:8Manifest8Provi.name: save()
Classes/Provider.html#/s:8Manifest8Provi.abstract: Updates the provider’s instance in the project’s manifest.

Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.name: type
Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.abstract: Denotes wheather the product is a library or an executable.

Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.name: linking
Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.abstract: How the product gets linked to a client project if it is a library.

Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.name: targets
Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.abstract: The package’s targets that the product can access.

Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.name: encode(to:)
Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.abstract: Encodes the objects public properties to an encoder

Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.name: save()
Classes/Product.html#/s:8Manifest7Produc.abstract: Updates the product’s instance in the project’s manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC11e.name: environment
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC11e.abstract: The current environment that the Manifest is being used in.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC4da.name: data
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC4da.abstract: Data that acts as the manifest file.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC8co.name: contents()
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC8co.abstract: Gets the contents of the project’s manifest as Data.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC8co.name: contents()
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC8co.abstract: Gets the contents of the project’s manifest as an NSMutableString.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC8co.name: contents()
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC8co.abstract: Gets the contents of the project’s manifest as a String.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC5wr.name: write(with:)
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC5wr.abstract: Rewrites the contents of the package’s manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC5wr.name: write(with:)
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC5wr.abstract: Rewrites the contents of the package’s manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC5re.name: reset()
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC5re.abstract: Rests the manifest to its orginal state when the project was created

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC12d.name: dependencies()
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC12d.abstract: Get all the elements in Package.dependencies array from the project’s manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC10d.name: dependency(withURL:)
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC10d.abstract: Get an element in Package.dependencies array from the project’s manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC4na.name: name(equals:)
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC4na.abstract: Gets the name of the Package declaration in the project’s manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC13p.name: packageConfig(equals:)
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC13p.abstract: Sets the value of the Package.pkgConfig property in the project’s manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC8pr.abstract: Gets all the Product instances in the current manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC9pr.abstract: Get all the elements in Package.providers from the project’s manifest.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC7pa.abstract: Gets the data from the package’s .resolved file about a package with a given name.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC7pa.name: package(withURL:)
Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC7pa.abstract: Gets the data from the package’s .resolved file about a package with a given repository URL.

Classes/Manifest.html#/s:8ManifestAAC7ta.abstract: Gets the targets declared in the project’s manifest.

Classes/Dependency.html#/s:8Manifest10De.abstract: The URI or path to the dependency.

Classes/Dependency.html#/s:8Manifest10De.abstract: Updates the dependency’s instance in the project’s manifest.

Classes/Dependency.html.name: Dependency
Classes/Dependency.html.abstract: An external package that the current project relies on.

Classes/Product.html.name: Product
Classes/Product.html.abstract: A product that is vended by the parent package.

Classes/Provider.html.name: Provider
Classes/Provider.html.abstract: Respresents a system package manager and the packages that should be installed through that given package manager.

Classes/Target.html.name: Target
Classes/Target.html.abstract: Represents a target declaration in a project’s manifest.
